website_summaries.verdict: A versatile option that can also be set up to work as a security system, although you may not realize the promised range.
pros: Easy to paint or wallpaper to match your decor
Works with up to 6 push buttons, motion detectors, or window and door contacts at a time
cons: Some buyers had problems getting this option anywhere near the 450-foot range the company claims

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the distance from the doorbell button to the base given our house is double-layer brick and walls are plaster/lathe - but it works very well. However, it is wayyyy to expensive for what it is. It's not as customization as you would think - just have a dozen or so choices and they're not as varied as you might think.
customer_reviews.author: J. DiGiovanni

customer_reviews.title: Now I know when my Amazon packages arrive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a wired doorbell that never worked after old home owners covered the wires after installing a new door...it was easy to install, easy to set up and has worked flawlessly since installing. Nice clean look, not too obtrusive. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a doorbell that works.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say here. I needed a wireless doorbell. This one worked fine. It was easy to install. The range is fine, I've got it mounted about 50 feet from the front door, through stucco. No issues. The chimes are a bit cheesy, but will do. This is not a musical instrument. It's a doorbell. I particularly liked the fact that I could stain the cover. I did to match my houses decor, and it matches well. In summation: Works as advertised, easy to install, and able to match existing decor.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H Meisels

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Our stone and brick entrance makes it difficult to install a wired doorbell and it is impossible to hear someone knocking from upstairs so a wireless doorbell was what we needed. This doorbell was easy to install, has a nice range of rings, and is easily heard throughout the house even when the vacuum or the washing machine is running. We have the chime near the front door so I haven't tested separating the chime from the doorbell. Eventually I'll paint it to match the hallway but in the meantime it is neutral enough that people don't notice it.
customer_reviews.author: LittleMy

customer_reviews.title: Great door bell!
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell works perfectly for me. I can hear it through out the house. The signal has to transmit through brick an one interior wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works a lot better than other ones I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Works a lot better than other ones I have tried. Has a larger distance to reach. I have the button on outside on a wall, and the signal has to go through a metal screen door and two exterior walls. Works every time. Wish it had an optional external power capability for the base unit. Amazon only has 20 left.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh D. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Finally a door bell that keeps working!
customer_reviews.text: I had gone through several battery-operated doorbells from each of the major home improvement stores in my area. They always stopped working within a few months. I've had this one for a year -- still works every time.
customer_reviews.author: ann silvers

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.text: LOUD, bought this to replace a cheap extender that didn't properly and was quite as a mouse. This sucker is *loud* even on mid-level settings. I used this on the 3rd floor in combination with one more extender for my 1st floor office. I tied them together with the door-bell RPWL3045A1003 that connects to the old doorbell's transformer. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this guy for about a year now. Still working like a charm, with the original set of batteries I put into it, too. Easy installation and setup... it's really fire-and-forget, which is awesome considering what a pain a wired doorbell can be to install. I had a hard time finding a wireless doorbell that looked good on the inside and had a sturdy, aesthetically-pleasing button on the outside. This Honeywell unit has both, and was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: TimG

customer_reviews.title: Great door bell replacement
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks it was easy to install the range was great, glad it has a volume control it’s almost to loud Its way easier than crawling in my attic to replace a bad transformer.
customer_reviews.author: suziq

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for the money. Nothing fancy but exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Annie D.

customer_reviews.title: Loud and works well
customer_reviews.text: Positioned this on the stairwell between our 1st and 2nd floor. It is about 30 ft from our front door and goes through at least one wall. We purchased a 2nd door bell and programmed it so the bell rings from the front and back door. The chime is very loud and we're very happy. No wireless issues nor delays. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Stietenroth

customer_reviews.title: 250 foot range is a fraud
customer_reviews.text: 250 foot range is a fraud. This thing seems to work nice upon installation, but, unless the battery just came out of the package, it doesn't reach 100 feet. Due to Honeywell's false marketing of the range, this thing has been more of a pain than it was worth.
customer_reviews.author: Rick's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Garage Office
customer_reviews.text: I have an office in what was a 1957 garage. The problem was I could never hear the doorbell. I got this unit togeterh with the range extender and now I hear the front door - and since I got a seperate bell for my office, I put it's button by the back door and we have two different tones, one for the front, a different for the back. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It is nice that you can custom stain it to match your decor. The set up was super easy and it works well. It has many options for rings and I love that it has volume control so it can be adjusted for your house. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Pricey...
customer_reviews.text: Decent performance at distance, but the sounds are lackluster for the price. THe cheap plastic frame vibrates at higher volumes which makes it sound cheap as well. The button is nice though, rubberized with a visible indicator of operation when pressed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and having control of the volume and type of chime is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Levit

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: didn't have to refinish, matched all the other items in room,easy to program ,,, and this servey is redicilious that you have to keep adding the number of words that they want to hear
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kimber

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and appears to have the enough range
customer_reviews.text: it's a door bell. easy to install and appears to have the enough range. sounds simulated and it didn't take to stain very well. it beats having to install a real door bell by about a mile.
customer_reviews.author: MARK J. FALA

customer_reviews.title: it functions as it should
customer_reviews.text: works well and fairly easy to setup. i used some Old English to stain the wood - looks really nice
customer_reviews.author: Walt Enfield

customer_reviews.title: Honeywell Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: HoneywellDoorbell is great and looks fantastic, it saved me from running wires to hardwire the older type Door Bell.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Powers

customer_reviews.title: Tired of wireless problems? This one's for you.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly as advertised. Easy installation and trouble free wireless connectivity. Doorbell is about 20 feet from the outside button (3 walls between them).
customer_reviews.author: Larry M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: This door bell was very easy to install - much easier than our old wired doorbell. On top of it, it looks great for the price. While the wood matched our decor nicely, it could easily be stained.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Tomczyk

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these units. (duplex). My one comment would be - I wish I could setup a second button that was assigned to a second ring tone. Front / Rear.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Was able to paint them to the color needed to match my decor. The sound is great and have no issues with reception from the transmitters. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MSB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for several years and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great options for different tones, and gives great sound throughout the home. A Keeper!
customer_reviews.author: CapGem

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We placed the wireless door chime in our centrally located kitchen, and we are very pleased that we can hear it from any room in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Like To Read more

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: All we wanted was a doorbell with a simple, retro "ding dong" sound but could we find one?! So many products out there with hideous melody chimes - some had THIRTY such (hideous) chimes! But we finally found exactly what we were after with this. And it's wireless too - installation took about 30 seconds. So after 6 years we finally have a doorbell! ( Honeywell website offered sound file samples so we could "try before we buy" - so helpful!)
customer_reviews.author: ES33

customer_reviews.title: top-shelf
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality. great range. easy to install. nice finish. wish it had a few more tone choices and/or customized. buy it.
customer_reviews.author: debbie smith

customer_reviews.title: Has every feature I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very well made.Easily installed.In use for 15 months. Have had 4 or 5 others which lasted an average of 6 months.The Cadillac of wireless door bells.
customer_reviews.author: stanley abrams

customer_reviews.title: Good doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Good distance even with my house being brick. Holding nice after a month. Use industrial strength batteries for best proformance and life.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Salts

customer_reviews.title: Works great, sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Great "Ding-Dong" that no one seems to have! Simple and clear. Great replacement to our old hard-wired bell that failed.
customer_reviews.author: Mahlon Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: The information that it required staining or painting was not clear in the posted information. The instructions were not as clear as wanted.
customer_reviews.author: cARL mChARGUE

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because a friend had one in her home and I liked the way it looked and sounded when it rang. I would recommend this. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, works perfectly and isn't affected by garage doors or other wireless devices.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: We love the Chime and it looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This Door chime is the 3rd make I have tried and it is the only one to work. It has a beautiful sound which my dogs do not bark at but lets us know when someone is at the front door ever when we are in the family room in the basement. I would recommend the door chime to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lossing

customer_reviews.title: Good doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I tried a different doorbell first from the big box hardware stores...it was awful and never worked right. This one works perfectly everytime and was easy to install as well. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: N. Lam

product_meta.title: Honeywell Home RCWL3505A1005/N RCWL3505A 1005/N Decor Customizable Wood Wireless Doorbell/Door Chime and Push Button, Medium, BurlyWood
product_meta.description:
Paint, paper, stain, or plain. The RCWL3505A from Honeywell Home is completely customizable to match your colors and style. You can wallpaper, stain, paint, or just keep it with the light pine finish to blend in with the interior design of your home. Hang this chime vertically or horizontally to fit your style or cover up existing holes. This premium door chime works with up to six (6) push buttons, motion detectors, or window and door contacts for added security, or motion detectors for peace of mind inside and out. The RCWL3505A also features six (6) selectable chime tunes, fully adjustable volume, CD quality sound, and low battery indicators on the push button and the door chime. Enjoy a stylish addition to your home decor with a premium decorative door chime from Honeywell Home.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Paint, paper, stain, or plain. The RCWL3505A from Honeywell is completely customizable to match your colors and style. You can wallpaper, stain, paint, or just keep it with the light pine finish to blend in with the interior design of your home. Hang this chime vertically or horizontally to fit your style or cover up existing holes. This premium door chime works with up to six (6) push buttons, motion detectors, or window and door contacts for added security, or motion detectors for peace of mind inside and out. The RCWL3505A also features six (6) selectable chime tunes, fully adjustable volume, CD quality sound, and low battery indicators on the push button and the door chime. Enjoy a stylish addition to your home decor with a premium decorative door chime from Honeywell.
feature_bullets: Works with up to six (6) push buttons, motion detectors or door contacts for added security and convenience
Six (6) chime tunes and fully adjustable volume
Self learning code system automatically adjusts to eliminate interference
